abstract: The Federal Trade Commission has opened a preliminary antitrust investigation into Google‘s planned $3.1 billion purchase of the online advertising company DoubleClick, according to The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Trade Commission has opened a preliminary antitrust investigation into Google‘s planned $3.1 billion purchase of the online advertising company DoubleClick, according to The New York Times.

headline.main: Google Deal Said to Bring U.S. Scrutiny
